comment.author: 32810243@N05
comment._content:
This is a precious gem.
The interior of Jaffa gate today doesn't resemble the photo: the road is still the same, the walls of the David Tower you can see on the right hand side of the photo are the same, but there are more buildings on the left side of the the photo, closer to the gate itself..
It is still a very lively spot and the main gate to enter into the old city from the western side.
